guiChart Class Reference

The chart containing the the zoom, crop and export buttons as well as the graph. Manages the dataset before it is displayed in the graph. More...

Detailed Description

The chart containing the the zoom, crop and export buttons as well as the graph. Manages the dataset before it is displayed in the graph.
